frontmatter.title: GatsbyJS to build blaizing fast websites

markdownRemark.html:
Gatsby is a React-based open-source framework for creating websites and apps. It is a great way to build blazing fast websites and to attract large volumes of traffic.

Why Gatsby?

If you already have skills in ReactJS and then there is so many options to further enhancing your React skills and speed up building beautiful interactive full stack enterprise level websites and one of the most popular component libraries is Gatsby.JS.

With Gatsby you will be able to build static websites using React. The library allows you to pull in data from various sources like CMS, API, databases or even a file system and markdown files. Sites can be generated through the command line or other starter packages to help speed along the process.

Gatsby is not only capable of building static site but further down the lane we can easily generate Progressive Web Apps just by adding one single line in its config file. This has made it more popular.

Gatsby is highly performant and blazing fast due to its the adaption of tech stack it used behing the seans. Mainly React is the core, and Webpack, GraphQL, ES6 JavaScript and CSS.

The Gatsby Ecosystem is extensible because it has a way to implement plugins as we require for a verity of functionality including making the site offline, adding responsive inline SVGs etc. this made the framework more flexible.

One cannot explain completely what Gatsby can do to your website in a blog page. So, to explain what Gatsby can do in your projects please visit https://www.gatsbyjs.com/
